Title: New customer opens a credit card account
Precondition: Customer is new; no existing account
Steps:
1. Open account creation form
2. Enter valid customer details
3. Submit
Expected Result: 1.System creates new account.  2. 15% New Customer Discount applied.  3. Discount valid today only.   4.Confirmation shows discount details.

Title: New customer with a coupon
Steps:
1. Open account creation form.   2. Enter valid details
3. Enter coupon
4. Submit.
Expected Result:
1.Account created.
2.System applies 15% New Customer Discount only.
3.Coupon ignored (not combinable).
4.Confirmation shows only 15%.

Title: Existing customer with a loyalty card
Precondition: Customer already exists; has loyalty card
Steps:
1. Login as existing customer.                   2. Enter valid loyalty card.
3. Submit.
Expected Result:
1. 10% Loyalty Discount applied.
2.Confirmation shows discount line.
3.Details stored in account.

Title: Existing customer with loyalty card and coupon
Precondition: Customer exists; has loyalty card + valid coupon
Steps:
1. Login.
2. Enter loyalty card
3. Enter coupon
4. Submit
Expected Result:
1.System applies 10% + 20% = 30% total.
2.Breakdown shown (10% + 20%).
3.Coupon marked as used.
4.Confirmation + account log updated.

Title: Existing customer with coupon only
Precondition: Customer exists; no loyalty card; valid coupon
Expected Result:
1. 20% Coupon Discount applied.
2.Confirmation shows discount.
3.Coupon marked as used.

Title: Existing customer without loyalty card or coupon
Expected Result:
1.No discounts applied.
2.Confirmation shows full price (0% discount).

Title: Existing customer with expired coupon
Precondition: Customer exists; coupon provided but expired
Expected Result:
1.Coupon rejected.
2.Message: “Coupon expired – no discount applied.”
3.No discount given.
4.Error log created.

Title: Existing customer with invalid loyalty card
Steps:
1. Login
2. Enter invalid loyalty card
3. Submit
Expected Result:
1.Loyalty card rejected.
2.Message: “Loyalty card not recognized.”
3.No loyalty discount applied.
4.Error logged.

Title: Missing customer type
Steps:
1. Open form.
2. Leave customer type empty
3. Submit
Expected Result:
1.System blocks submission.
2.Error: “Please select customer type.”
3.No account created/discount applied.

Title: Existing customer selects "New" option
Precondition: Customer already exists in the system
Steps:
1. Login with existing customer account
2. In account creation form, select "New Customer"
3. Submit
Expected Result:
1. System rejects input
2. Error message: “Existing customers cannot register as New.”
3. No new account created / no discount applied

Title: Existing customer with invalid coupon code
Precondition: Customer exists; coupon entered but code invalid
Expected Result:
1.Coupon rejected.
2.Message: “Coupon invalid – no discount applied.”
3.No discount given.
4.Error log created.

ID:
Test cases 1 user story 
Open a credit card account.
1. New customer opens a credit card account
3. Existing customer with a loyalty card
4. Existing customer with loyalty card and coupon
5. Existing customer without loyalty card but with a coupon
6. Existing customer without loyalty card and without coupon
7. Existing customer with an expired coupon
8. Existing customer with an invalid coupon code
9. Existing customer with an invalid loyalty card number
